data.author: Thibaut Rey

changelog.release_notes:
- Voice search now available

Voice search is an experimental feature. The results are correct but need some refinement (filtering, ordering...).

- Add compatibility for Pebble Time Round
- Fix a bug that made the app crash before navigation for Pebble and Pebble Steel
- Add arrows to indicate the direction you have to turn

- Now display the distance alongside the arrival time in the list of routes
- Now display the rating of a place
- Now indicates if a place is currently open (not always available)
- Now available in both kilometers and miles

- Now with bright new colours for Pebble Time and Pebble Time Steel
- Lots of bug fixes

- Navigation text is bolder and bigger

It is time for a better Directions for Pebble. If you like this app as much as I do and want to put it to the next level, join me here : 
https://directions.uservoice.com/

Post your ideas and I will make sure to implement the most popular ones.

PS : There is a surprise coming for Pebble Time, Pebble Time Steel and Pebble Time round users
- The tutorial message no longer display after two times (Sorry fo that boring popup)

The so expected "My Locations" feature is finally available.
You can save your own locations and access them directly on your watch in a matter of seconds. 
And as usual no Companion app required. 

Enjoy and do not forget to donate if you like the app.

Improvement for public transport : 
- Now displays the line number on the route list
- Now displays the line number and name on the navigation page
- Now displays the departure time and bus stop name of the next bus 
- Now displays how many stops before leaving the bus

Many bugs fix

data.description:
Get google maps directions right on your wrist. No companion app required. 

Features : 
- Search for places around you
- Save a place in your favourite and find it later
- More than 25 different kind of places : Airport, Bar, Cafe, Hospitals, Dentist, Clothing store, Movie theater, Night clubs, Restaurant ...
- Use any of the 4 modes from : Public Transport, Driving, Walking, Bicycling
- Specify preferences : Bus, Tram, Rail, Subway, Fewer steps, Less walking ...
- Choose from up to 10 different routes
- Low battery life impact
- No companion app required
- Available in both kilometers and miles

It is time for a better Directions for Pebble. If you like this app as much as I do and want to put it to the next level, join me here : https://directions.uservoice.com/ Post your ideas and I will make sure to implement the most popular ones.

Are you a dev ? Directions is public on Github if you want to help. http://sncs.io/directionsOnGithub

Google Maps charges me for the usage of the API. If you like the app please consider making a donation (website link bellow). Thank you :)

latest_release.release_notes:
- Add compatibility for Pebble Time Round
- Fix a bug that made the app crash before navigation for Pebble and Pebble Steel

data.title: Directions
